content:
Branches for fishing rods?
Just shake the trees, and you'll see snow falling from the sky-
No, I mean branches falling from the sky~!
info: 幻雪关于制作钓竿_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Yip~ Those were such nostalgic times.
<size=30>Only later did I learn how rare it was... What a heartache.</size>

content:
Are you attempting to craft a fishing rod?
When I first tried making one myself,
I used some peculiar branches I found by the roadside.

content:
What are you looking for?
You keep circling around under that tree.

Starting a new life requires such thorough preparation.
